sentences.english: She rose from her seat to watch him.
sentences.chinese: 現在她從樹樁上站起身來看他。

sentences.english: He looked around and saw the bird standing on a stump and crying.
sentences.chinese: 他四下看了看，看見啄木鳥正站在一個樹樁上哭呢。

sentences.english: Babbitt sat on the stump , facing the dark pond, slapping mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 巴比特面對黑暗的池塘坐在樹樁上，不時拍打蚊子。

sentences.english: I barked my shin on a tree stump.
sentences.chinese: 磕到了樹樁上，脛部擦破了皮。

sentences.english: Candidates would give short stump speeches each time the train stopped at one of these towns.
sentences.chinese: 候選人會在小站停車時作簡短的樹樁演說。

sentences.english: A bunch of us jumped over a rail, onto the pilings on the East River, ready to jump in.
sentences.chinese: 很多人跳過圍欄，站在東河上的樹樁上準備跳進去。

sentences.english: When cut for firewood, they will sprout new growth from the remaining stump.
sentences.chinese: 若砍樹作柴，則砍後的樹樁還會生出新芽來。

sentences.english: He could only see the stumps around him.
sentences.chinese: 他惟一能看到的只是周圍的樹樁。

sentences.english: It took the farmer weeks to grub the stumps on his land.
sentences.chinese: 這位農夫花了數週時間清除他田地裏的樹樁子。

sentences.english: In the state of Song there was a farmer in whose fields stood a tree stump.
sentences.chinese: 從前，宋國有個農民，他的田地中有一顆樹樁。

sentences.english: Pete Wentz, Andy Hurley, Patrick Stump and Joe Trohman of Fall Out Boy pose for a red-carpet photo.
sentences.chinese: 皮特溫茲，安迪赫爾利，帕特里克樹樁和喬走紅毯。

sentences.english: Sometimes they den up to 90 feet high in the broken-off trunks of ancient trees.
sentences.chinese: 有時它們也會爬到90英尺高的古樹的樹樁裏去。

sentences.english: Additionally, he was stumbled by a stake.
sentences.chinese: 而且他還被一個樹樁給絆倒了。

sentences.english: Flushed and breathing hard, she sat down on a stump to wait for her father.
sentences.chinese: 她兩頰發紅，呼吸急促，坐在一個樹樁上等待父親。

sentences.english: Here and there sat well-worn stumps and logs and the remnants of a campfire.
sentences.chinese: 到處都是用舊了的樹樁和圓木，還有篝火的灰燼。

sentences.english: ROAD-GANG is pulling stumps, bogged down in mud.
sentences.chinese: 一隊築路的犯人在泥沼中拖動着樹樁。

definition: fuse (for an explosive device)/electrical lead/intermediary/catalyst/(dialect) sewing needle
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
